query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `faqs` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `question` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `answer` text NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(100),
  `tags` json,
  `order` int DEFAULT 0,
  `keywords` text,
  `searchContent` text,
  `views` int DEFAULT 0,
  `helpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `notHelpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `helpfulRatio` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  `semanticSearchHits` int DEFAULT 0,
  `semanticSearchClicks` int DEFAULT 0,
  `isPublished` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `isPinned` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `embedding` json,
  `embeddingModel` varchar(100) DEFAULT 'text-embedding-3-small',
  `embeddingDimension` int DEFAULT 1536,
  `embeddingGeneratedAt` timestamp,
  `needsEmbeddingRefresh` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `createdBy` int,
  `updatedBy` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user KrGaEuKwKPW5NAp.root --database mP6FLm6cHUyVdEMNViNuZS --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `faqs` (
  `id` int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `question` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `answer` text NOT NULL,
  `category` varchar(100),
  `tags` json,
  `order` int DEFAULT 0,
  `keywords` text,
  `searchContent` text,
  `views` int DEFAULT 0,
  `helpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `notHelpful` int DEFAULT 0,
  `helpfulRatio` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT 0.00,
  `semanticSearchHits` int DEFAULT 0,
  `semanticSearchClicks` int DEFAULT 0,
  `isPublished` boolean DEFAULT true,
  `isPinned` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `embedding` json,
  `embeddingModel` varchar(100) DEFAULT 'text-embedding-3-small',
  `embeddingDimension` int DEFAULT 1536,
  `embeddingGeneratedAt` timestamp,
  `needsEmbeddingRefresh` boolean DEFAULT false,
  `createdBy` int,
  `updatedBy` int,
  `createdAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` timestamp DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
